attributes.action: allow Intelligent design to be taught alongside the usual unintelligent design view of origins in schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Intelligent Design should be given equal or more time over Un-intelligent Design in the class room. Perhaps we are able to acknowledge, finally, the swing away from 'religion' over the past few hundred years, not due to reason but in reaction to church abuses.
